alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 2:47AM CDT until June 24 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Eastern Boyd County in north central Nebraska... Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 246 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Lynch to near Bartlett, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 230 AM CDT, a 76 mph gust was reported at O`Neill Airport. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... O`neill, Spencer, O`Neill, Ewing, Lynch, Page, Bartlett, Ericson, Gross, Inman, Bristow, Monowi, Knievels Corner, Buffalo Flats, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Pibel Lake State Recreation Area and Opportunity. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 304 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 122 and 144. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
